name: Zaniah
text:
Heheheh....
It's been a while, hasn't it?
You don't seem to have changed, [Player].

name: Zaniah
text:
Now then.
Without further ado, let me hear it from you.
What business do you have today, hmm?

name: Zaniah
text:
You've come all the way to this
remote planet just to see me.
It's not some boring errand, is it?

Zaniah observed [Player]'s appearance intently,
as if appraising them. And then—

name: Zaniah
text:
Hmph.
I see, I see......

name: Zaniah
text:
That "thing" you're carefully keeping
in your pocket is related to your visit, isn't it?
The phantom thief Zaniah sees right through everything!

name: Zaniah
text:
Come on! Give up quickly,
and hand over your prize to me!
Oh hohoho!

name: Zaniah
text:
Hmm? What is this...?
A treasure map...
It doesn't seem like one, though.

name: Zaniah
text: ...Is this chocolate shaped like a 1 Raph coin?

name: Zaniah
text:
Heheheh.
Quite clever, aren't you?
Not bad, I like it!

name: Zaniah
text:
Hmm?
Is this a Valentine's gift...?
What is that?

name: Zaniah
text:
...You're saying there's an event in your place
where you give chocolate to important people?
So if [Player] is giving this to me......

name: Zaniah
text:
W-wait a minute!
[Player]!
Don't you dare tease me!

name: Zaniah
text:
...You're serious, aren't you?
To try and steal a phantom thief's heart,
you've got some nerve, don't you?

name: Zaniah
text:
...Come on, let's get going quickly!
I've got somewhere I need to rush to!

name: Zaniah
text:
You know where we're going, don't you?
I'm going to welcome you into my family!

name: Zaniah
text:
It's too late to object now!
This is what happens when you do something careless!

name: Zaniah
text:
—What did you say!?
You've already prepared chocolate for my family too!?

name: Zaniah
text:
You're surprisingly
shrewd, aren't you......

name: Zaniah
text:
Oh hohoho!
It seems fortune has finally smiled
upon this beautiful phantom thief, Zaniah!

name: Zaniah
text:
With [Player] by my side,
no matter how heavily guarded the treasure,
we'll be able to gracefully steal it away!

name: Zaniah
text:
...After all, my, um...
I-it's nothing!

name: Zaniah
text:
...That settles it, let's make haste!
Let's go back home and have a pre-celebration!

name: Zaniah
text:
The "Grand Heist with [Player]" Plan
is officially underway!!

name: Zaniah
text:
...You understand what that means, don't you?
You're my family now.
So, don't go off somewhere on your own, okay......
